author: Special Correspondent
text:
Woman suffers

serious burn injuries

A 25-year-old woman who suffered severe burn injuries at her residence near Vadipatti was admitted to Government Rajaji Hospital on Saturday night.

Police said that the woman, I. Manimekala, sustained 65 per cent burns. Her six-year-old daughter Anjali also suffered minor injuries. The Vadipatti police are investigating whether it was a suicide attempt.
title: Woman suffers burns
